name: BigDug
description:
Random theme: Very big

You are a Big Dug!

Press Space to disassemble into Duglings, and press Space again to assemble into a Big Dug.

Arrow keys to control all Dugs!

The Big Dug can jump over small obstacles.

The Duglings can walk over water petals.

Made on Friday by MK, TK, AK, and León
